oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Symmetries of higher-spin current interactions in four dimensions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gelfond, O. A.
Vasiliev, M. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Current interaction of massless fields in four dimensions is shown to break sp (8) symmetry of free massless equations of all spins down to the conformal symmetry su (2,2). This breaking is in agreement with the form of nonlinear higher-spin field equations.
Comment: 19 pages, contribution to the volume in honor of Igor Viktorovich Tyutin; V2: 20 pages, clarifications added, typos corrected, the version to be published in TMPh
